projects.title: Deplora
projects.description: A platform for managing deployment plans, providing users with an intuitive platform to oversee application deployments.

projects.title: Library Management System
projects.description: A web-based application designed to streamline library operations, providing an efficient platform for managing resources.

projects.title: SPM Agile Assistant Chatbot
projects.description: An AI assistant built using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to provide intelligent and context-aware answers to Agile-related queries.

projects.title: VoteZone Frontend
projects.description: An application to create and manage elections with a clean and intuitive interface.

projects.title: Training Ramp Up
projects.description: A full-stack web application designed to manage user and student data. User authentication and authorization are implemented to ensure data security.

mobile.title: Library Management System Mobile
mobile.description: The mobile version of the LBMS web application. Designed to streamline library operations, making it efficient and user-friendly. A digital platform for library patrons to manage and access library resources.

mobile.title: Talk Together (Phase One)
mobile.description: An application designed to break down language barriers. Enables users to have meaningful conversations regardless of their native languages, fostering better communication.

mobile.title: Health Pro Simple Application
mobile.description: An application for Leo Club members in Sri Lanka to mark their own attendance. Admins can create events, track participants' locations, and verify attendance based on user location

mobile.title: Donate D Points
mobile.description: An innovative application to redeem rewards and benefits effortlessly. Features an intuitive interface and seamless functionality to manage and utilize accumulated rewards.

career.organization: Fcode Labs Pvt Ltd | Progress Magic
